CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Lunes__c,'Falto'), 1, IF(ISPICKVAL( Lunes__c, 'Tarde'), 0.5,0)) +IF( ISPICKVAL(Martes__c,'Falto'), 1, IF(ISPICKVAL( Martes__c, 'Tarde'), 0.5,0)) +IF( ISPICKVAL(Miercoles__c,'Falto'), 1, IF(ISPICKVAL( Miercoles__c, 'Tarde'), 0.5,0)) +IF( ISPICKVAL(Jueves__c,'Falto'), 1, IF(ISPICKVAL( Jueves__c, 'Tarde'), 0.5,0)) +IF( ISPICKVAL(Viernes__c,'Falto'), 1, IF(ISPICKVAL( Viernes__c, 'Tarde'), 0.5,0))
CustomField.label: Asistencia
